00006 <script type='text/javascript'>
00007 // using debugging utilities
00008 W.module('debug'); // W.test, W.Timer, ...
00009 
00010 // (module/control inclusion)
00011 W.control('AnyBox');
00012 </script>
00013 
00014 <script type='text/javascript'>
00015 var rainbow = 'red,orange,yellow,green,blue,navy,purple'.split(',');
00016 var a;
00017 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00018     a = new W.AnyBox('div');
00019     a.core.style.background = rainbow[i];
00020     a.wps = '20%,20%,left:'+ (20 * i) +',top:'+ (20 * i);
00021 }
00022 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00023     a = new W.AnyBox('div');
00024     a.core.style.background = rainbow[i];
00025     a.wps = '20%,20%,right:-'+ (20 * i) +',top:'+ (20 * i);
00026 }
00027 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00028     a = new W.AnyBox('div');
00029     a.core.style.background = rainbow[i];
00030     a.wps = '20%,20%,left:'+ (20 * i) +',bottom:-'+ (20 * i);
00031 }
00032 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00033     a = new W.AnyBox('div');
00034     a.core.style.background = rainbow[i];
00035     a.wps = '20%,20%,right:-'+ (20 * i) +',top:'+ (20 * i);
00036 }
00037 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00038     a = new W.AnyBox('div');
00039     a.core.style.background = rainbow[i];
00040     a.wps = '20%,20%,right:-'+ (20 * i) +',bottom:-'+ (20 * i);
00041 }
00042 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00043     a = new W.AnyBox('img');
00044     a.wps = '20%,20%,xcenter:0,top:'+ (20 * i);
00045     a.core.src = 'http://www.google.com/intl/en/images/logo.gif';
00046 }
00047 
00048 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00049     a = new W.AnyBox('input');
00050     a.wps = '20%,20%,left:'+ (20 * i) +',ycenter:0';
00051     a.core.type = 'button';
00052     a.core.value = 'click me';
00053     a.core.onclick = function(){alert('Hello, world!');};
00054 }
00055 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00056     a = new W.AnyBox('select');
00057     a.wps = '20%,20%,right:-'+ (20 * i) +',ycenter:0';
00058 }
00059 for(var i = 0; i < rainbow.length; ++i){
00060     a = new W.AnyBox('textarea');
00061     a.wps = '20%,20%,xcenter:0,bottom:-'+ (20 * i);
00062     a.core.value = 'textarea\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n';
00063 }
00064 
00065 var b = new W.AnyBox('iframe');
00066 b.wps = '20%,20%,xcenter:0,ycenter:0';
00067 b.core.src = 'http://wednus.com';
00068 </script>
